tool.name: loc2newbkp
tool.displayname: Create Backups for Track Points and Lines

param.name: web_pts
param.displayname: Source Track Points Feature Service Layer
param.dialogReference: Track points feature service layer. Provide the full URL of the layer (including index number).

param.name: loc_pts_new
param.dialogReference: New backup feature class for track points.

param.name: lines_new
param.dialogReference: New backup feature class for track lines, generated from points with adequate location accuracy only.

param.name: break_by
param.dialogReference:
Attribute used to group points into track lines. Options include:

  • user_date (recommended: a derived field combining the [user's full name]-[date of collection])

  • session_id (an ArcGIS field which identifies a unique location tracking session for a user)

Note that track lines will be split into multiple lines using the specified track lines time gap.

param.name: break
param.dialogReference: Time duration in seconds used to define a break in continuous collection, used for assignment of track lines. When a time gap greater than this is encountered, it is considered the start of a new track line.

tool.summary: Copies data from an existing track points feature service layer to a new feature class. Points are attributed with a 'use' column, indicating if they should be used to generate track lines. Lines are then generated from these points. These feature classes (or feature services generated from them) can then be used as the backup layer inputs to the 'Update Backups of Track Points and Track Lines' tool.

idCitation.resTitle: Create Backups for Track Points and Lines
